Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Sidekick
MY DAD THINKS I'M ENTIRELY TOO POSSIBLE: POWER: If there is no d6 on this card, roll a d6 and place it on this card. // When a character within range and line of fire rolls an attack roll, you may remove the d6 from this card and replace a die in the roll with it.

tyroclix
WIN/LOSS 3-0. This little b****** lived up to his name hitting 3 pulse waves to knock SR Gladiator, Aquaman, and SR First Born off their starting clicks in 3 different games. He didn't even use his die to do it! Okay for the points, he brings die replacement to a few keywords. Nothing stellar unless your dice are on fire but then you don't need his die power.

Goop
Another die replacement effect (we all know how good that is by now). Being tiny and in hindering terrain is going to give him 19def so he's got some decent def already before you add in all the sidekick captain stuff to keep him alive. I'm expecting to see many things from Adolf here over the coming months. At least he's unique.
